name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stoic Tab: Your Daily Dose of Wisdom

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for Stoic quotes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the power of Stoicism with Stoic Tab, a beautifully designed Chrome extension that transforms your new tab into a source of inspiration and tranquility. Each time you open a new tab, you'll be greeted with a carefully selected Stoic quote that encourages reflection and mindfulness, helping you navigate life with clarity and purpose.

Features:

Daily Stoic Quotes: Enjoy a fresh quote every time you open a new tab, featuring wisdom from renowned Stoic philosophers like Marcus Aurelius, Seneca, and Epictetus.

Elegant Design: The extension boasts a stunning background image that complements the quotes, creating a serene atmosphere for your browsing experience.

Why Stoic Tab? 
In a fast-paced world filled with distractions, Stoic Tab offers a moment of calm and contemplation. Embrace the wisdom of the Stoics and let their teachings guide you towards a more resilient and fulfilling life.

Support Creators: If you find value in our quotes and would like to support the project, consider tipping us through our Ko-fi page!
